248337.「お集まりの 皆さまぁ～っ！ \n 第７回 アストルティア・ナイト コンテストに:
Ladies and gentlemen!I'd like to introduce the
handsome men who will be participating in the
7th Astoltia Knight Contest!

248338.「総勢４８人の予選を勝ち抜いた ５名と！\n ファルパパ神による特別推薦枠 ３名:
5 winners from a total of 48 qualifiers, and 3 specially recommended by the Falpapa Gods! 3 specially recommended by Falpapa God! In
total, 8 handsome men will battle it out!

248339.「トップバッターは おなじみ過ぎる この人！ \n その驚異の足跡は 前人未到の:
The top batter is an all too familiar face!The top batter is the all-too-familiar Mr. Kubota!He's won an unprecedented three
consecutive championships!

248340.「見つめ合うより あなたに背中を預けたい……。\n 一緒なら どんな死線も 素敵:
Instead of staring at each other, I want to put my back into your hands. If we're together, no matter what the line of death,
it's a wonderful date! The lone swordsman who appears and disappears from the world..! Hyuza!

248344.「主君を案じる その横顔に 誰もが胸キュン！ \n 広い背中に 忠義を背負って:
The profile of a man who cares for his lord makes everyone's heart throb!With loyalty on his broad back, he goes alone on a man's path
of flowers! A swordsman with a true heart! Faras!

248349.「さらには 最強の 時渡りの使い手で……って \n スペックが高すぎて 肩書も大:
He is also the most powerful time-traveler, and his title is too busy with his high specs! A reliable dandy that men would fall in love
with! Padre!

248356.「さあ～って お次は ついに……って \n ちょっと～！ 起きてる～？: Next, finally... hey~! Are you awake?

248357.「あら～？ 追いまわしすぎちゃったかな？\n まっいいか！ 今年もおなじみ 強制:
Oh, no? Did I chase you too much? Oh well! We've been forced to go again this year! Even if you try to escape, it doesn't work that
way~!

248358.「皆の支援は 愛ゆえなのか 意地ゆえか！ \n やる気がないのに いつも上位だ！:
Is everyone's support out of love or out of stubbornness?I'm always at the top of the list even though I have no motivation! Today, I'm
still maturing! Lord Duston!

248360.「じゃじゃーん！\n 第７回 アストルティア・ナイト コンテストの\n 結果発表:
Ta-da! We are going to start announcing the
results of the 7th Astoltia Knight Contest!

248361.「さあさあ！ ホワイトショコラ城の\n ナイトの座は 誰の手に！？\n 耳の穴か:
Come on, come on, come on! Who will be the
Knight of White Chocolate Castle? Listen
carefully with your ears plugged~!

248362.「いっくよ～！\n みんなっ ステージに 注目するべし～っ！！:
Let's go! Everyone, pay attention to the
stage!

251596.「３連覇を達成しちまうなんて……夢みたいだぜ。 \n ここまで来られたのも みん:
It's like a dream come true to win three championships in a row.It's thanks to all of you that I've made it this far. Thank you for
supporting me.

251597.「ここまで来たら もう このオレにしか\n つかめない勝利……４連覇を 目指すぜ:
I've come this far, and now I'm going for the fourth straight victory that only I can get.I'm counting on you to give me your
strength!

251598.「さて お次は～！ 真摯な誓いを 胸に秘め \n さすらう日々は 彼の心を 強く:
Now, the next one..! True, with a sincere vow in his heart, his wandering days made his heart strong. His twin swords are strongest
when he wields them for someone else!

251599.「舞台上まで すごい熱気が 伝わってくるぞ！ \n もう一度 この盛大な祭りに参:
You can feel the excitement all the way to the
stage!What a pleasure it is to be able to
participate in this grand festival once again.

251600.「この場に立つ者は 皆ライバル！ \n 久々に 本気の勝負ができそうだ。\n こ:
Everyone standing here is a rival!It's been a
while since we've had a real competition.
Let's enjoy this Faras with all our might!

251601.「ふっ なかなか 言うじゃないか。\n 無論 全力で 来てもらわないと困る。\n:
Well, that's quite a thing to say. Of course,
you'll have to come with all your might. You
and I go way back, don't we?

251602.「おおーーっとぉ！ 男の友情が まぶしいぞ！ \n お次は エテーネ王国の王弟に:
Oh, wow! The friendship of men is Dazzling!Next up, the royal brother of the Ethene Kingdom, a kind father who loves his
wife and son!

251603.「どれほど自在に 時を 渡れたとしても……。 \n 大切な人々と 共に過ごせる日:
No matter how freely I can cross time.The days
I can spend with the people I love are the
only place I wish to live.

251604.「この場に 皆と参加できること うれしく思う。\n 私も この祭りを 存分に楽し:
I am happy to be here with all of you. I'm
going to enjoy this festival as much as I can.
And since I'm participating, I must win!

251605.「今年の戦いは 大人の男が しのぎを削る！ \n 次なる登場者も クールな魅力に:
This year's battle is all about grown men working hard!The next contestant has a cool charm and a lot of fans! They've come all the
way from faraway, unexplored places!

251606.「ゴーグルの奥に隠れた 知的な瞳……。 \n 真実を求める彼の その眼差しこそが:
Intellectual eyes hidden behind goggles.His
gaze that seeks the true fruit is the supreme
treasure! A wise seeker~! Rahul!

251607.「皆の応援は 俺の心を いつも照らしてくれる。 \n そう 夜空に浮かぶ 美しい:
Your support always lights up my heart.Like
the beautiful moon in the night sky. I came
here to respond to their voices.

251608.「俺は ナイトの座に 再び挑む！\n 一度は消えた あの光を 再びこの手にするた:
I will challenge for the title of Knight again! I ask you to lend me your strength so that I may once again hold that light in my
hands.

251609.「わしは寝てるので 勝手にやるがいいですッ！\n 毎年こりない アンタらの ポン:
I'm sleeping, so you can do it on your own! I'll be skipping it for real, too, out of respect for you guys' junkitude that doesn't
quit every year!

251610.「これで ナイトに選ばれでもしたら \n アストルティア・ナイトってのは 世界一:
If I were to be elected Knight, it would mean
that Astoltia Knight is the most useless award
in the world.

251611.「そういうの……うぷぷ……。\n 最ッ高に ロクでもなくて 大好きですよ……。\:
I love that kind of wupupupu. I love it. I
love it.

251612.「予選通過者は 以上 ５名ッ！！ \n 続いて ファルパパちゃんによる\n 特別:
These are the 5 who have passed the qualifying
round!Next, Falpapa will introduce the three
special nominees...!

251613.「鬼が出るか 蛇が出るか！ \n 深淵なる魔界より 新たな挑戦者の登場だ！:
Will the devil or the snake come out?From the
depths of the Demon World comes a new
challenger!

251614.「不敵な笑みが 見据えるのは 魔界の夜明け！ \n その上から目線は 大物の証か:
The dawn of Demon World is in sight with a fearless smile!Is that superiority a sign of a big man? The bold windbreaker of the Demon
World! Yushka!

251615.「俺の手で 魔界は新たに 生まれ変わる！\n お前らには 俺が歴史を塗り替え\n:
Demon World will be reborn by my hands! You
will have a special seat at the table as I
rewrite history and usher in a new era.

251616.「俺の歩む道は あまりに険しい 修羅の道だ。 \n だが その先に待つ 新しい魔:
My path is too steep for carnage.But don't you
want to see the new Demon World that awaits
us?

251617.「次なるニューフェイスも 魔界からの刺客！ \n 魔族らしからぬ 慈愛に満ちた:
The next new face is also an assassin from Demon World!With a smile filled with affection that is uncharacteristic of Demon, he will be
able to hold the attention of all the maidens.

251618.「ただよう気品は 魔界最古の 高貴な血筋ゆえ！\n ゼクレス魔導国の 正統なる後:
The elegance of the Zechres is due to their noble lineage, the oldest in the Demon World! The rightful heir of Zechres! The graceful
Demon King Asbal!

251619.「この祭典のことは 以前から知っていた。 \n 戦いによらず 競い合える 奇跡の:
I had known about this festival for a long time.I have known for a long time that this festival is a miracle where we can compete
without fighting. I am truly honored to be able to participate.

251620.「僕の目には この場のすべてが 輝いて見える。 \n まさに ここは 僕の夢見た:
To my eyes, everything in this place shines.This is truly the Astoltia of my dreams! I'm going to enjoy this festival as
much as I can.

251621.「ええい！ いつまでチンタラしておる！\n いいかげん 待ちくたびれたぞ！\n:
Oh, come on! How long are you waiting? I'm
tired of waiting! Quickly introduce me!

251622.「ちょ ちょっと～！\n ちゃんと紹介するから 待っててよ～！:
Wait a minute~! I'll introduce you properly.
Wait for me~!

251623.「え～っと 見た目も中身も 前のめり！ \n 巨大なプライドと 揺るがぬ自信は\:
Let's see... both in appearance and in substance, he is a forward-thinking person!Is your immense pride and unshakable confidence
proof of genius or youthful indiscretion?

251624.「態度もでかいが 前髪もでかい！ \n 奇抜な出で立ちは まさに 歩く前衛芸術～:
He has a big attitude, but he also has big bangs!His eccentric appearance is truly a walking avant-garde art! The heir to the blood
of the Great Demon King! Peperogora!

251625.「フハハハハ！\n じじいから受け継ぎし この才能……。\n 世界がついに オレ:
Hahahahaha! I inherited this talent from my
grandfather. The world has finally caught up
with me!

251626.「時は来た！ オレ様の芸術センスで \n この祭りを革命する！ オレ様の生み出:
The time has come! I will revolutionize this festival with my artistic sense! Let's all bow down before the art of the century that I have
created!

251627.「以上っ！ ８名の \n イケメンと そうじゃないのが\n ナイトの座をかけ コ:
That's all! 8 good looking guys and 8 not-so-
good looking guys will be competing for the
title of Knight!

251628.「栄光の座に かがやくのは 誰か……\n それを決めるのは！\n こ・こ・に・い:
Who will be crowned with glory? It's you who
will be here~!

251629.「さ～て どう？ どう？ <pc>。 \n ちょーイケメンが 大集合だけど\n:
Well, what do you think? How's it going? .There's a big group of very handsome men here, but honestly, who's my
favorite~?

251630.「アストルティア・ナイトに ふさわしいと思う \n イケメンを選んだら\n キミ:
When you have chosen a handsome man who you
think is worthy of being Astoltia Knight, cast
your vote!

251631.「そうそう。今回 投票するのは\n 私の カワイイ妹っ！\n 集計係モカの所だか:
Oh, yeah. This time, I'm voting for my little
sister! Tallier Mocha's place, so be careful!

251632.「ナイトに 投票し終わったら\n 話すことがあるから メリルの所に 来るべし！\:
When you're done voting for Knight, you should come by Merrill's place because we have something to talk about! I'll be waiting
outside, I promise~!
